name: Mechs V Kaijus
description: Mechs V Kaijus is an addictive hardcore tower defense gameplay. It’s a tough game that really makes you feel like you’re on the back foot from start to finish. In Mechs V Kaijus you take on the role of Commander of a powerful Mechs squadron.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Quad Core Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
